protocol.name: P-GSE8955-1
text: ABS_CALL = The call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), marginal (M), or no call (NC)
DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-10
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 2% sodium hypochlorite, thoroughly washed with RO (reverse-osmosis) water and spread on MS plates. The plates were kept at 4 degree Celsius for 3-5 days for cold treatment and transferred to constant blue-light at 22 ± 1 degree Celsius

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-11
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown under constant blue-light (35 µmol/sec/m2) and presence of abscisic acid (0.5 µm) for 10 days at 22 ± 1 degree Celsius

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-12
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 2% sodium hypochlorite, thoroughly washed with RO (reverse-osmosis) water and spread on MS plates supplemented with abscisic acid (0.5 µm). The plates were kept at 4 degree Celsius for 3-5 days for cold treatment and transferred to constant blue-light at 22 ± 1 degree Celsius

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown under constant dark for 10 days at 22 ± 1 degree Celsius

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-3
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 2% sodium hypochlorite, thoroughly washed with RO (reverse-osmosis) water and spread on MS plates. The plates were kept at 4 degree Celsius for 3-5 days for cold treatment and transferred to constant dark at 22 ± 1 degree Celsius

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-4
protocol.text: Extraction of total RNA was performed using Trizol, according to the manufacturer's instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 h at 45 degree Celsius on Affymetrix ATH1 Arabidopsis Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 using script EukGE-WS2v4_450

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using GeneChip Scanner 3000

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with GeneChip Operating Software (GCOS 1.4) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100

protocol.name: P-GSE8955-9
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown under constant blue-light (35 µmol/sec/m2) for 10 days at 22 ± 1 degree Celsius
